ButtonControler_why: WHY
ButtonControler_how: HOW

stiliseret_soegning.why_content: Skimming and sorting information are both important abilities to have when you study, this assignment helps you practice them. You also gain knowledge about The American Dream.
stiliseret_soegning.how_content: Start by searching the words and phrases you associate with "The American Dream", for instance "The American Dream", identity, "rags to riches".

vid_set_da.why_content: This exercise has a double purpose, on the one hand you practice recognizing different aspects of setting on an actual film and get feedback so you can tell if you are on the right track. On the other hand you get a better understanding of this particular film.
vid_set_da.how_content: Watch the film and answer the questions as you go along. Be sure to read the feedback after each answer.

vid_shot_da.why_content: This exercise has a double purpose, one the one hand you practice recognizing different aspects of the area of analysis dealing with shot on an actual film and get feedback so you can tell if you are on the right track. On the other hand you get a better understanding of this particular film.
vid_shot_da.how_content: Watch the film and answer the questions as you go along. Be sure to read the feedback after each answer.

vid_plot_da.why_content: This exercise has a double purpose, one the one hand you practice recognizing different aspects of plot on an actual film and get feedback so you can tell if you are on the right track. On the other hand you get a better understanding of this particular film.
vid_plot_da.how_content: Watch the film and answer the questions as you go along. Be sure to read the feedback after each answer.

billeddrag_dearamericans_1.why_content: In this exercise you work with understanding the two main characters and their development. You also practice descriptive vocabulary.
billeddrag_dearamericans_1.how_content:
Watch the first half of the film and choose the words you think describe each character best.
Click the words you have placed to get feedback.
Hold translate to translate words to Danish.
Not all words will fit the characters.

billeddrag_dearamericans_2.why_content: In this exercise you work with understanding the two main characters and their development. You also practice descriptive vocabulary.
billeddrag_dearamericans_2.how_content:
Watch the second half of the film and choose the words you think describe each character best.
Click the words you have placed to get feedback.
Hold translate to translate words to Danish.
Not all words will fit the characters.

vid_an.why_content: This exercise has a double purpose, one the one hand you practice recognizing different aspects of film analysis including both SHOT, SET and PLOTon an actual film and get feedback so you can tell if you are on the right track. On the other hand you get a better understanding of this particular film.
vid_an.how_content: Watch the film and answer the questions as you go along. Be sure to read the feedback after each answer.

billeddrag_antisocial.why_content: In this exercise you work with understanding the two main characters and their development. You also practice descriptive vocabulary.
billeddrag_antisocial.how_content:
Watch the second half of the film and choose the words you think describe each character best.
Click the words you have placed to get feedback.
Hold translate to translate words to Danish.
Not all words will fit the characters.

search_american_dream.why_content: Skimming and sorting information are both important abilities to have when you study, this assignment helps you practice them. You also gain knowledge about The American Dream.
search_american_dream.how_content: Start by searching the words and phrases you associate with "The American Dream", for instance "The American Dream", identity, "rags to riches".

search_social_media.why_content: Skimming and sorting information are both important abilities to have when you study, this assignment helps you practice them. You also gain knowledge about social media.
search_social_media.how_content: Begin by searching for the words you associate with "social media" for instance communication, estrangement, network, online friendship, "selfie". Refine your search as you learn more.

berettermodel.why_content: This assignment lets you practice recognizing plot structure.
berettermodel.how_content: Look at the material about plot structure, choose the correct term in each phase of the Hollywood model.

videoplaylister.why_content: Working with film-analysis is part of the subject of English and to do that in a meaningful way you need the proper vocabulary and an understanding of what to look for. The following video will introduce you to the main film techniques.
videoplaylister.how_content:
• Get an introduction to film analysis
  • Get the content as text
  • Get an overview of the three main analysis concepts: set, plot, shot
  • Read the helpful questions
  • Watch the introduction first. Then go into the film techniques in depth

the_conflict_box.why_btntext: Learn about how to analyze the conflict between characters.
the_conflict_box.why_content: This assignment lets you practice recognizing plot structure.
the_conflict_box.how_content: Follow the different steps in the document.
